name: Youll Be In My Heart
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
CAPO 1

[Verse]
[ch]F[/ch]
Come stop your cryin' it will be alright
Just take my hand, hold it tight
[ch]Bb[/ch]
I will protect you from all around you
[ch]Gm[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]
I will be here, don't you cry
[ch]F[/ch]
For one so small, you seem so strong
My arms will hold you keep you safe and warm
[ch]Bb[/ch]
This bond between us, can't be broken
[ch]Gm[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]
I will be here, don't you cry

[Chorus]
[ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]                [ch]F#m[/ch]
You'll be in my heart, you'll be in my heart
      [ch]Bm[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]
From this day on, now and forever more
[ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]F#m[/ch]
You'll be in my heart, no matter what they say
      [ch]Bm[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]A[/ch]
You'll be here in my heart, always

[Verse]
[ch]F[/ch]
Why can't they understand the way we feel?
They just don't trust what they can't explain
[ch]Bb[/ch]
I know we're different but deep inside us
[ch]Gm[/ch]                            [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]
 We're not that different at all

[Chorus]
[ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]                [ch]F#m[/ch]
You'll be in my heart, you'll be in my heart
      [ch]Bm[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]
From this day on, now and forever more

[Verse]
[ch]G[/ch]
Don't listen to them, what do they know?
[ch]Em[/ch]
We need each other to have, to hold
[ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
They'll see in time. I know
[ch]G[/ch]
When destiny calls you, you must be strong
[ch]Em[/ch]
I may not be with you, but you got to hold on
[ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
They'll see in time. I know
       [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]
We'll show them together

[Chorus]
[ch]E[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]B[/ch]               [ch]G#m[/ch]
You'll be in my heart, you'll be in my heart
      [ch]C#m[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]B7[/ch]
From this day on, now and forever more
[ch]E[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]B[/ch]                [ch]G#m[/ch]
You'll be in my heart, no matter what they say
      [ch]C#m[/ch]             [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]B[/ch]
You'll be here in my heart, always

[Ending]
[ch]A[/ch]                [ch]E[/ch]
Always, I'll be with you
         [ch]A[/ch]
I'll be there for you always
            [ch]E[/ch]
Always and always
          [ch]A[/ch]
Just look over your shoulder
          [ch]E[/ch]
Just look over your shoulder
          [ch]A[/ch]
